HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: |Recent changes: |-Fixed tools being unable to designate multiple items in one cell (storage mods fix).

Update 4 of Recycle This mod brings you: |-Completely reworked logic behind workgivers. Should give some perfomance improvements on old colonies. |-Separation of destroy and recycle work givers. Now you can fine tune priority of those if you have Work Tab from Fluffy. |-Improved mod compatibility. Now any modded workbenches (even gas benches from VFE) work with mod. |-Recycling of none-smelthable apparel now requires either tailor bench or crafting spot. |-Recycling speed now considers work speed factor of workbench. |-New work type "Recycle". Vanilla smelting is also moved there. |-Switched natural priority of "Art" and "Crafting", because it doesn't make sense in vanilla. |-Added new bill "Scrap apparel" for all tailor benches (including modded ones). In case you want to automate your recycling through bills. |-Mod options (only contained option to disable apparel scrapping) removed.
